TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Cursor extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示沿 X 轴定义位置的横线或竖线。

span.span: Represents a horizontal or vertical line that defines a position along an axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 光标是沿轴定义位置的水平或垂直直线。A cursor is a horizontal or vertical line that defines a position along an axis. 范围选择是沿轴定义的范围, 由开始和结束位置定义, 并使用半透明颜色显示。A range selection is a range along an axis that is defined by a beginning and end position, and is displayed using a semi-transparent color. 游标和范围选择由类实现, 该类作为对象的和属性公开。Cursors and range selections are both implemented by the class, which is exposed as the and properties of the object. 对象用于图表区域的 X 轴, 而对象用于 Y 轴。 The object is for the X axis of a chart area, and the object is for the Y axis. 这些对象的属性确定关联的轴是主要轴还是辅助轴。The property of these objects determines whether the associated axis is primary or secondary. 在类外部找到的唯一游标和范围选择功能是与根对象中的光标和范围选择相关的事件。The only cursor and range selection functionality found outside the class are the events related to the cursor and range selection that are in the root object.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个标志，该标志确定如果范围选择操作超出图表区域的边界，是否会发生滚动。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that determines whether scrolling will occur if a range selection operation extends beyond a boundary of the chart area.

value.span: 如果数据视图可以自动移动，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the data view can be scrolled automatically; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果数据视图不显示绘制系列中的所有数据点, 并且用户选择了范围, 则当此属性为`true`和鼠标并且光标移动到图表区边界之外时, 将会自动滚动视图。If a data view does not display all data points in a plotted series and a range is being selected by the user, automatic scrolling of the view will occur if this property is `true` and the mouse - and therefore the cursor - is moved outside the chart area boundary. 如果有更多的数据可供查看, 则仅沿某个轴进行滚动。Scrolling will only occur along an axis if there is more data available to be viewed. 如果最终用户缩放为数据的一个子集, 则通常不显示所有数据的数据视图。A data view that does not display all data usually results if the end-user zooms into a subset of data. 视图和缩放由类实现。Views and zooming are implemented by the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisType AxisType { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisType get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisType value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置光标附加到的轴的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of axis that the cursor is attached to.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值表示光标是附加到主轴还是辅助轴。

span.span: An enumeration value that represents whether the axis is attached to the primary or secondary axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有两组轴: 主要轴和辅助轴。There are two sets of axes: primary and secondary. 除条形图外, 所有图表的主坐标轴都位于图表区域的底部 (主 X 轴) 和左侧 (主 Y 轴) 边框。Primary axes for all charts except the bar charts are located at the bottom (primary X-axis) and left (primary Y-axis) border of the chart area. 辅助轴位于图表区域的右侧 (辅助 X 轴) 和顶部 (辅助 Y 轴) 边框。The secondary axes are located at the right (secondary X-axis) and top (secondary Y-axis) border of the chart area. > [!NOTE] > 如果图表区域中绘制的所有序列仅使用一种类型的轴 (例如, 主 X 轴), 则将此属性设置为系列未使用的轴类型 (在本例中为辅助 X 轴) 将不起任何作用;光标将自动附加到用于绘制序列的唯一轴上。If all series plotted within a chart area use only one type of axis (for example, the primary X-axis), then setting this property to an axis type not used by the series (in this case, the secondary X-axis) will have no effect; the cursor will automatically be attached to the only axis being used to plot the series.

summary.span: 释放 类使用的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the class.

span.span: Releases unmanaged and, optionally, managed resources.

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置光标间隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the cursor interval.
The cursor interval.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定最终用户可以绘制游标的频率和位置, 以及可以绘制范围选择的开始和结束点的位置。The property determines how often and where a cursor can be drawn by an end user, as well as where the beginning and end points of a range selection can be drawn. 如果值为零 (默认值), 则表示可以在图表区域中的任意位置绘制光标或范围选择。A value of zero, which is the default value, signifies that a cursor or range selection can be drawn anywhere within a chart area. 非零值表示在用户交互设置时, 仅按指定的间隔绘制选定范围的光标或开始点和/或终结点。A nonzero value signifies that the cursor or beginning and/or end points of a selected range will only be drawn at the specified interval when set by user interaction. 度量单位由属性确定。The unit of measurement is determined by the property. 此属性还可以与属性结合使用, 这允许您指定与指定间隔的偏移量。This property can also be used in conjunction with the property, which allows you to specify an offset from the specified interval. 例如, 若要允许只显示每个星期六的游标, 则应指定间隔为1周, 并将间隔偏移量指定为6天。For example, to allow a cursor to only be displayed every Saturday, an interval of 1 week should be specified, along with an interval offset of 6 days. 在 .NET Framework 中, 星期日被视为一周的第一天。In .NET Framework, Sunday is considered to be the first day of the week. 如果通过设置属性来启用光标用户界面, 并在图表区域内单击鼠标, 则光标的位置将设置为最接近的允许位置。If the cursor user interface is enabled by setting the property, and the mouse is clicked inside a chart area, the position of the cursor will be set to the nearest allowable location. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果以编程方式设置光标或范围选择的位置, 则属性不起作用。The property has no effect if you set the position of a cursor or range selection programmatically.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double IntervalOffset { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.IntervalOffset : double with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置间隔偏移量，该偏移量影响当用户对光标和范围选择进行设置时可以绘制它们的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval offset, which affects where the cursor and range selection can be drawn when they are set by a user.
The offset from the interval.

value.span: 默认值为零，表示没有限制，允许使用负值。

span.span: The default value is zero, which signifies no limitations, and negative values are allowed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定游标的间隔偏移量以及范围选择的开始和/或结束点。The property determines the interval offset of a cursor and the beginning and/or end points of a range selection. 此属性与属性结合使用, 可确定光标和范围在图表区域中的显示位置。In conjunction with the property, this property determines where a cursor and range can be displayed within a chart area. 默认值为零, 表示没有偏移量。A value of zero, which is the default, signifies that there is no offset. 度量单位由属性确定。The unit of measurement is determined by the property. 偏移量会影响光标所在的位置以及范围选择的开始和/或结束点。The offset affects the locations at which a cursor and the beginning and/or end points of a range selection can be drawn. 例如, 若要允许只显示每个星期六的游标, 则应指定间隔为1周, 并将间隔偏移量指定为6天。For example, to allow a cursor to only be displayed every Saturday, an interval of 1 week should be specified, along with an interval offset of 6 days. 在 .NET Framework 中, 星期日被视为一周的第一天。In .NET Framework, Sunday is considered to be the first day of the week. 如果通过设置属性来启用光标用户界面, 并在图表区域内单击鼠标, 则光标的位置将设置为最接近的允许位置。If the cursor user interface is enabled by setting the property, and the mouse is clicked inside a chart area, the position of the cursor will be set to the nearest allowable location. > [!IMPORTANT] > 以编程方式设置范围选择或光标位置时, 与时间间隔相关的属性不起作用。Interval-related properties have no effect when a range selection or cursor position are set programmatically.

summary.span: 获取或设置轴的光标和所选范围的间隔偏移量类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval offset type of a cursor and selected range for an axis.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值确定间隔偏移量的度量单位。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the unit of measurement for the interval offset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定间隔偏移量的类型, 该类型是使用属性指定的。 The property determines the type of interval offset, which is specified using the property. 如果将属性设置为, 则将使用属性设置。 If the property is set to , the property setting will be used. > [!NOTE] > 以编程方式设置范围选择或光标位置时, 与时间间隔相关的属性不起作用。Interval-related properties have no effect when a range selection or cursor position are set programmatically.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType IntervalType { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置轴的光标和所选范围的间隔类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval type for the cursor and selected range of an axis.

value.span: 轴的光标和所选范围的间隔类型。

span.span: The interval type for the cursor and selected range of an axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定间隔的类型, 该类型是使用属性指定的。 The property determines the type of interval, which is specified using the property. 如果间隔类型为, 则将该间隔的度量单位视为`double`, 这在指定值时等效于一天。If the interval type is , the unit of measurement for the interval is treated as a `double`, which is equivalent to one day when values are specified. > [!NOTE] > 以编程方式设置范围选择或光标位置时, 与时间间隔相关的属性不起作用。Interval-related properties have no effect when a range selection or cursor position is set programmatically. 如果轴间隔类型表示时间 (例如, 小时、分钟等等), 那么, 为了正确启用缩放功能, 还必须将设置为时间值。If the axis interval type represents a time - for example, hours, minutes, and so forth - then in order to correctly enable the zooming function, the must also be set to a time value. 例如, 如果以小时为单位表示 IntervalType, 则 ChartArea1. CursorX 可设置为 ChartArea1。For example, if the ChartArea1.AxisX.IntervalType is expressed in hours, then the ChartArea1.CursorX.IntervalType could be set to minutes.

summary.span: 获取或设置光标位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the position of a cursor.
The position of a cursor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于获取光标的位置, 还可用于以编程方式设置光标位置。This property can be used to get the position of a cursor, as well as to programmatically set the cursor position. 此位置度量为游标所属轴的值, 由属性确定。The position is measured as a value of the axis that the cursor belongs to, which is determined by the property. 例如, 如果游标属于主 X 轴, 则将此属性设置为2000年1月1日的值将导致 X 轴游标沿轴上2000的位置绘制。For example, if the cursor belongs to the primary X axis, then setting this property to a value of January 1, 2000 will result in the X-axis cursor being drawn at the January 1, 2000 position along the axis. 如果此轴值不存在, 则不会显示光标。If this axis value does not exist, the cursor will not be displayed. 请注意, 如果设置此属性, 则和属性将不起作用; 即, 光标将显示在此指定位置。Note that if you set this property, the and properties will have no effect; that is, the cursor will be displayed at this specified location. 设置此属性不会引发或事件。Setting this property will not raise the or events. 或者, 和方法可用于设置游标。Alternatively, the and methods can be used to set the cursor. 若要以编程方式删除游标, 请使用此属性设置光标的位置。To programmatically remove a cursor, use this property to set the position of the cursor to .

summary.span: 获取或设置突出显示某一范围数据的半透明颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets a semi-transparent color that highlights a range of data.
The color of the highlighted range.

value.span: 默认值为 ，其 alpha 值为 120。

span.span: The default value is , with an alpha value of 120.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定范围选择的颜色, 并且可以设置为任何有效的 ARGB (alpha、红色、绿色、蓝色) 值。This property determines the color of the range selection, and can be set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果未提供确定透明度级别的 alpha 值, 则使用默认的 alpha 值120。If an alpha value, which determines the level of transparency, is not provided, a default alpha value of 120 is used. 可以为 X 轴和 Y 轴游标设置所选颜色, 这是使用 对象的和属性分别实现的。The selected color can be set for both the X and Y axis cursors, which is implemented using the and properties of the object, respectively. 如果在 x 轴上只选择范围, 则使用 x 轴游标的值; 如果在 y 轴上仅选择了范围, 则使用 y 轴游标的值。If a range is only selected along the X-axis, the value for the X-axis cursor is used; if a range is only selected along the Y-axis, the value for the Y-axis cursor is used. 如果沿两个轴都选择了范围, 则 Y 轴游标的值也用于选定的颜色。If a range is selected along both axes, the value for the Y-axis cursor is also used for the selected color.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double SelectionEnd { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.SelectionEnd : double with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置范围选择的结束位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the end position of a range selection.
The end position of a range selection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户可以通过单击鼠标左键并拖动鼠标来选择图表区内的范围。A user can select a range within a chart area by clicking on the left mouse button and then dragging the mouse. 请注意, 属性还必须设置为。 `true`Note that the property must also be set to `true`. 此外, 还可以使用和属性或或方法以编程方式设置范围选择。In addition, a range selection can be set programmatically using either the and properties, or the or methods. 范围选择的结束位置计算为游标所属的轴的值。The end position of a range selection is calculated as a value of the axis to which the cursor belongs. 例如, 如果游标属于主 x 轴, 并将该属性的值设置为2000年12月31日, 则所选区域的结束时间将在主 X 轴上的 2000 12 月31日进行。For example, if the cursor belongs to the primary X-axis, and you set the property to a value of December 31, 2000, the end of the selected area will occur at December 31, 2000 along the primary X axis. 若要以编程方式删除范围选择, 请使用和属性将范围的开始点和结束点设置为, 或使用方法。To programmatically remove a range selection, set the beginning and end points of the range to using the and properties, or use the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置光标所选范围的起始位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the start position of a cursor's selected range.

value.span: 光标所选范围的起始位置。

span.span: The start position of a cursor's selected range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户可以通过单击鼠标左键并拖动鼠标来移动光标位置, 从而选择一个范围。A user can select a range by clicking on the left mouse button and then moving the cursor position by dragging the mouse. 请注意, 属性还必须设置为。 `true`Note that the property must also be set to `true`. 此外, 还可以使用和属性或或方法以编程方式设置范围选择。In addition, a range selection can be set programmatically using either the and properties, or the or methods. 范围选择的开始位置计算为游标所属的轴的值。The start position of a range selection is calculated as a value of the axis to which the cursor belongs. 例如, 如果光标属于主 x 轴, 并将属性设置为2000年1月1日的值, 则所选区域的开始将在主 X 轴上的2000第1月1日发生。For example, if the cursor belongs to the primary X-axis, and you set the property to a value of January 1, 2000, the beginning of the selected area will occur at January 1, 2000 along the primary X axis. 若要以编程方式删除范围选择, 请使用和属性将范围的开始点和结束点设置为, 或使用方法。To programmatically remove a range selection, set the beginning and end points of the range to using the and properties, or use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetCursorPixelPosition (System.Drawing.PointF point, bool roundToBoundary);

Public Sub SetCursorPixelPosition (point As PointF, roundToBoundary As Boolean)

param.name: point
param.span: 一个 结构，该结构指定绘制光标的位置。

span.span: A structure that specifies where the cursor will be drawn.
